Skills: We are looking for ambitious & result driven people who want to join the world of Real Estate.

We are seeking a motivated and highly skilled Real Estate Sales Agent to join our growing team. As a Real Estate Sales Agent, you will be responsible for attracting, prospecting, and servicing clients by building relationships and providing expert guidance through the buying, selling, or renting process. You will be a key player in our mission to provide exceptional real estate services to clients and help them achieve their real estate goals.

Build a network of potential clients through prospecting, cold-calling, and marketing efforts.
Provide clients with expert advice and guidance on buying, selling, and renting real estate.
Negotiate contracts, write offers, and manage transactions from start to finish.
Provide ongoing communication and follow-up with clients to ensure their needs and satisfaction are met.
Attend networking events and other real estate industry events to continue to build relationships and expand your network.
Continuously educate yourself on industry trends, best practices, and new technologies to stay ahead of the competition.

At least 1 year proven track record as a real estate agent
Strong interpersonal, communication, and negotiation skills.
Ability to build relationships quickly and effectively.
Self-motivated and results-driven with a strong work ethic.
Valid UAE driving license
